text: z Development should consist of a mixed-use scheme with elements of residential and employment floorspace. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – maximum of 75% of floorspace – Town centre uses (Class E) – at least 25% of floorspace – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Improved pedestrian crossing over Aspen Way z The site is within the Canary Wharf Fringe and is expected to provide at least 25% of the floorspace as commercial uses, with a focus on Central Activities Zone strategic uses as defined in the London Plan.
